rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment contains neutral economic projections and descriptions.
Discusses production metrics, which are Neutral for Q3.
The segment reports production numbers but contains no explicit calming cue.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes production projections, not capability or preparedness related to the threat.
'produce up to 14.9 million tons... up to 15.35 million tons... increase of up to 2.6%... up to 3.7%' reports numerical metrics factually.
